About.paragraph: App solution to close the infrastructural and technological gaps in terms of management, structure and setting up of e mobility charging infrastructure. The App will integrate all available charging stations/providers with all available functions.At the same time new charging stations shall be installed in the gaps with public collaborations and partnerships.
Why: One of the most user friendly mobile applications that eases existing EV chargers navigation
Collaborating with public spaces to install EV chargers
Why2: Collaborate and assist electric grids to maintain and build infrastructure
Provide useful shopping,leisure insights to app users during the time required/spent  to charge the EV

Services.name: Easy to use
Services.text: Providing businesses to existing charging stations with our app.

Services.name: Wide range of Categories
Services.text: providing accessories to for EV user for charging.
